    react中解决this指向问题的三种方式

    # 01、使用箭头函数解决

    import React from "react";

class Hello extends React.Component {

    state = {
        count: 0
    }

    addCount() {
        this.setState({
            count:this.state.count+1
        })
    }

    // 箭头函数解决this指向问题
    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <div>数量:{ this.state.count }</div>
                <button onClick={ () => this.addCount()}> +1 </button>
            </div>
            
        )
    }
}

export default Hello

    # 02、使用bind解决

    import React from "react";

class Hello extends React.Component {

    state = {
        count: 0
    }

    constructor() {
        super()
        this.addCount = this.addCount.bind(this)
    }

    addCount() {
        this.setState({
            count:this.state.count+1
        })
    }

    // 使用bind解决指向问题
    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <div>数量:{ this.state.count }</div>
                <button onClick={ this.addCount}> +1 </button>
            </div>
            
        )
    }
}

export default Hello

    # 03、使用class的实例方法(推荐)

    import React from "react";

class Hello extends React.Component {

    state = {
        count: 0
    }

    addCount = () => {
        this.setState({
            count:this.state.count+1
        })
    }

    // 使用类实例方法解决
    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                <div>数量:{ this.state.count }</div>
                <button onClick={ this.addCount}> +1 </button>
            </div>
            
        )
    }
}

export default Hello
